direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods compare dates but focus on different date components (days vs. weeks). They share similar control flow and parameter handling.
Both methods compare dates but focus on different date components (weeks vs. months). They share similar control flow and parameter handling.
Both methods compare dates but focus on different date components (weeks vs. quarters). They share similar control flow and parameter handling.
Both methods compare dates but focus on different date components (weeks vs. years). They share similar control flow and parameter handling.
The validate method is used to parse date strings, which can be a prerequisite for the compareWeeks method. They both handle date-related operations.
The getCalendar method is used internally by compareWeeks to convert Date objects to Calendar objects. They both handle date conversion and time zone adjustments.
